Animals

The animals module

class biosim.animals.Carnivore(age, weight)[source]

Constructor method for carnivore with entered age and weight.

The carnivore class is a subclass of the Herbivore class, using most of the methods from Herbivore except the feeding method.

Parameters:
  • age (int) – Age of animal
  • weight (float) – Weight of animal
feeding(preys)[source]

Feeding method for carnivores

Goes though all the herbivores in the same cell as the carnivore and checks if the carnivore eats it or not. This depends on fitness of both carnivore an herbivore, the parameters ‘DeltaPhiMax’ and ‘beta’, and the appetite of the carnivore. It also updates the weight and fitness of the carnivore.

Parameters:preys (list) – A list of all the herbivores on the same tile as the given carnivore
Returns:eaten_bool – A list of true/false values for which herbivores to be eaten. False means it is to be eaten, and removed for the cell.
Return type:list
class biosim.animals.Herbivore(age, weight)[source]

Constructor-method for making an herbivore of set age and weight.

Parameters:
  • age (int) – Age of herbivore
  • weight (float) – Weight of herbivore
aging()[source]

Method for handling the aging of an animal. Also updates fitness.

death()[source]

Method for for checking if the animal should die from natural causes

Calculates the chance of dying due to low fitness, by using the parameter ‘omega’

feeding(landscape_instance)[source]

Handles the feeding of the animal

Parameters:landscape_instance (The tile, that the given animal is in) –
get_weight()[source]
Returns:The weight of the animal
Return type:float
loss_of_weight()[source]

Method for handling the loss of weight, by natural causes

A method for decreasing the weight of animal every year by a parameter ‘eta’ multiplied by the animals own weight. Also updates fitness.

migration()[source]

Method for checking if the animal will migrate

Returns:True or False value; if the animal wil move or not
Return type:bool
procreation(landscape_instance, number_of_adults)[source]

Handles the procreation of the animals

Parameters:
  • landscape_instance (object) – The tile of the animal
  • number_of_adults (int) – Number of animals old enough to procreate
classmethod set_parameters(parameter_changes)[source]

Method that allows the user to set parameter values for the animal.

Method that allows the user to set parameter values for the animal. This replaces the default values.

Parameters:

parameter_changes (dictionary) – A dictionary with one or more keys to set new parameters for the animal. The items should be numeric.
Raises:
  • KeyError – If parameter_changes contain key(s) not already in the parameters.
  • ValueError – If parameter values that are to be set are not valid, such as negative amounts of fodder/weight.
update_fitness()[source]

Method for updating fitness.

The attribute self.fitness is updated.
